name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems for financial platforms, specializing in AI and ML solutions. Proficient in a diverse tech stack including **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), **Go**, **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **Pinecone**, **Weaviate**, as well as CI/CD tools like **GitHub Actions** for streamlined development processes. Experienced in creating scalable APIs and microservices, with a focus on testing and monitoring to ensure high availability and performance. Proven ability to collaborate effectively with teams, leveraging strong communication skills to contribute to impactful projects at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to engineer backend services for document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, improving efficiency by **30%**.
Developed cohesive solutions with **Celery** and **Redis** for asynchronous transaction processing, reducing processing time by **15%**.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, enhancing deployment speed and reliability across **5** major projects.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory compliance using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring consistent and timely data flow by automating **100+** data exchanges.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C**, achieving an **80%** increase in authentication efficiency across applications.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to navigate system integration challenges, ensuring compliance and overseeing release strategies across **12** major releases.

Outlined core responsibilities and achievements while focusing on the required skills for the **Senior AI Engineer** role:
- Developed scalable backend systems utilizing **Python** and **FastAPI**, enhancing document workflows and user onboarding by **30%**.
- Designed and implemented event-driven **microservices** with **Celery** and **Redis**, significantly improving asynchronous processing of financial data by **40%**.
- Managed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, utilizing **Terraform** for infrastructure automation, ensuring a consistent and scalable environment for **over 10** applications.
- Engineered robust data pipelines for secure regulatory data exchange via **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, automating data flow and reducing manual intervention by **50%**.
- Conducted comprehensive security audits, achieving compliance with industry standards and integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure authentication, enhancing access control by **20%**.
- Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless system integration and compliance, successfully managing **5+** major releases per annum.

• Developed backend services using **Python**, **Go**, and **Flask** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, improving trading operations and achieving a performance increase of **30%**.
• Engineered efficient real-time price feed processors with **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** to provide up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, achieving latency reduction of **20ms**.
• Collaborated with frontend development teams to deliver robust data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket channels**, ensuring seamless user interactions with the platform and improving user experience scores by **15%**.
• Ensured compliance with industry standards, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, by implementing security measures and meeting regulatory requirements within project timelines.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, which streamlined QA and CI processes, reducing bug rates in production by **25%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions utilizing **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution efficiency and management of background processes.
• Contributed to team activities through effective **teamwork** and **communication**, fostering a collaborative environment and sharing knowledge on **Microservices** and **AI Models**.
